title: update failed unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information
body: I keep seeing this message when I try to patch the game and when I try to repair the game files. Please help me, Ive looked on here and on redit but the fixes arnt working for me. Its patch 6.15

replies.body: I'd like to help with this, but need some more information.  The unspecified error could mean something different depending on what part of the patcher it's occuring.  At what percent is this error happening, or is it while scanning files?  Anything can help!
I'm getting it at 33% when it says calculating files at ~900 files scanned. It's a bit different every time i try. i tried all the options on the League patching issues site.
I got a problem at 33% finishing!
i got the exactr same problem, ive been looking for 3 hours now to solve this. but nothing is working for me, pls help me silve this issue

Same here, I've tried everything ! Including changing the region, deleting solutions/download files ,  and also following all the steps in here https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues . we need help as {{summoner:4}}  as you can !
me and my friend have the same problem, at 33%
